summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6084 for the improvement of 34th Avenue Southwest from West Cloverdale Street to West Thistle Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83727, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
